title: Finding out the pattern with Pascal's Triangle.
text: We know that the variables in this pattern will follow the pattern in Pascal's triangle. You should use the row of Pascal's triangle where the second number is $$5$$.

title: Finding out the coefficients.
text: The coefficients according to Pascal's triangle are $$1$$, $$5$$, $$10$$, $$10$$, $$5$$, $$1$$.

title: Expanding the polynomial.
text: Use the formula: $$\left(a+b\right)^n$$ $$=$$ $$a^n$$ + $$___$$ $$a^n-1b^1$$ + $$___$$ $$a^n-2b^2$$ +... + $$___$$ $$a^1 b^n-1$$ + $$b^n$$ and fill in the blanks with the values from Pascal's triangle.

title: Simplify the equation.
text: Simplifying the equation results in the solution: $$x^5-15x^4+90x^3-270x^2+405x^1-243$$.
